page.title: 16My day at Stokenham School.
page.content: I wake up at about 7.30 a.m. and go to school at 9.10 a.m. When I get to school we write most of the morning until "break". We have three "breaks" altogether. After "break" my teacher talks for half an hour then we go to Maths. Maths ends at 12.15 a.m. We go and line up for dinner. We go in at about 12.30. After dinner we have the longest break of all. When we come in we do reading until 2.00 p.m. then we do our art. We have another "break" at 2.45 and come in at 3.00 p.m. After "break" we have hymn practice until 4.00 p.m. Before hymn practice we have half an hour more of art. Then we go home. I go home by car. Me and my brother go out and play until my dad comes home and that is about 7.00 p.m. We come in and have tea and watch T.V. I go to bed at 9.00 p.m. That is a Monday for my family.
